Internal Crypto API Interface
[Cryptographic Abstraction Layer]

Collaboration diagram for Internal Crypto API Interface:

The XSCrypt Interface provides cryptographic functions that are missing from other libraries.

Currently this only provides Base64 functionality which is not available in the Windows Crypto API.
